meals.name: Margherita Pizza
meals.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.

meals.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
meals.description: Spaghetti tossed in a creamy sauce made with egg yolks, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.

meals.name: Beef Bourguignon
meals.description: A French beef stew braised in red wine, with bacon, mushrooms, and pearl onions.

meals.name: Pad Thai
meals.description: A popular Thai dish made with rice noodles, shrimp, eggs, bean sprouts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

meals.name: Fish and Chips
meals.description: A British classic featuring beer-battered cod fillets served with crispy French fries and tartar sauce.
